Name: Statuette of  Neith
Description: Neith is represented striding, with her left foot advanced. She wears a long tightly fitting dress, a red crown, and a broad collar. The whites of the eyes and the collar are inlaid, the former with electrum and the latter with gold. In the left hand she had originally held an attribute, probably a scepter, now missing. A line of hieroglyphic inscription encircles the base. with a tenon below.
